about_the_game:
Enter the microcosm

Your home puddle was invaded by a mysterious alien-esc species. The ecosystem is off balance.
Join the small microorganism Nunti on its journey through the puddle system's wide expanse. Can you save your home and reconquer the puddle system from the invaders? Can you unravel the mysteries of this microcosmic world and beyond?


Meso, the heart of every puddle, is dying. Find and bring energy to it to save your puddle.

Mysterious invaders block your way, trying to hinder you from getting to Meso. Deadly algae have grown and consumed the energy, and Meso’s energy runs out.
Dodge your enemies, destroy the algae and hurry up! Your time is running out.

Master the movement

MESO offers a unique, very sensible floaty movement to you. Master it and get rewarded with a fast-paced rush through the world of MESO.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Meso is a fast-paced exploration-action game with arcade feel and a unique underwater movement. Enter the microcosmic world of puddles and save the ecosystem. Fight against the algae plague and the mysterious invaders. Collect energy, dodge your enemies and master the unique underwater movement.
